name: Rollin' Ball Arcade
description:
Rollin' Ball Arcade is a marble ball rolling 3D platformer where you roll over neon fragments while testing your logic and agility skills. Collect all the fragments and roll all you want!

----

A game made in one hour, based on Unity's Roll-a-Ball learn project.

Built with Unity 2019.4 LTS.

Controls

Arrows or WASD - Movement

R - Restart

Assets & Tools
  • DOTween
  • Chiptone
  • Better Minimal WebGL Template
